summary: Frontend testing of new procurement components (ProjectManagement, SupplierManagement) completed successfully. All features working as expected.

issues: Console warning: 'Missing Description or aria-describedby={undefined} for DialogContent' - accessibility warning

action_items: Consider adding aria-describedby to DialogContent components for better accessibility
critical_code_review_comments: All new components (ProjectManagement, SupplierManagement, CatalogManagement) are well-structured with proper data-testid attributes
Components properly use props for API_V2_URL and getAuthHeaders
Filter functionality in ProjectManagement works correctly for 'without_supervisor' and 'without_engineer' filters
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_PRJ001 project and TEST_مورد اختباري جديد supplier during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: New procurement components tested: ProjectManagement (create, filter, edit projects), SupplierManagement (view list, add supplier). All CRUD operations working. Components are integrated into ProcurementDashboard via header buttons 'المشاريع' and 'الموردين'.

features_verified: Stats cards display correctly (total, active, without supervisor, without engineer)
New project form with all fields (code, name, owner, supervisor, engineer, location)
Create project functionality - success toast and list update
Filter by status (all, active, completed, without_supervisor, without_engineer)
Edit project inline (edit mode with save/cancel buttons)
Projects table with proper columns and badges
Suppliers list displays with contact info (name, phone, email, contact person)
Add supplier form with all fields
Create supplier functionality - success toast and list update
Edit and delete buttons for each supplier
Header buttons for المشاريع and الموردين open respective dialogs
Components receive correct props (API_V2_URL, getAuthHeaders, onRefresh)
